PROFILE CONTACT DETAILS
Name: Sambhav Suri Email ID: sambhavsuril @gmail.com
Gender: Male Contact (Mob): +91 8130343185
D.O.B: 11t November 2002 State of Residence: New Delhi

 

EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS/ CERTFICATIONS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

COURSE/ CLASS INSTITUTION/ UNIVERSITY YEAR OF PASSING PERFORMANCE
B.Techin CSE with minor | Maharaja Surajmal institute of Pursuing (2021-2025 90.4%
Specialization in AI/ML Technology (MSIT), Guru Gobind batch) (till 6% sem)

Singh IP University (GGSIPU)
Senior Secondary Delhi Public School, Rohini (CBSE) 2021 95.4%
Secondary Delhi Public School, Rohini (CBSE) 2019 90.5%
INTERNSHIPS
e Data Analytics Intern at IBM SKILLSBUILD July 2024 - August 2024 (6 weeks)

Gained experience in analyzing data and understanding various aspects of data analysis using Python libraries such as
Matplotlib, NumPy, Pandas and Scikit learn.
e Atal Innovation Mission, NITI Aayog, Government of India March 2024 - May 2024 (8 weeks)
Tech and Innovation research intern at National Institution for Transforming India, worked under the
department of Atal Tinkering Labs. Actively supported ATL through strategic and analytical tasks.
e Summer Training at Brain Mentors, New Delhi July 2023 - Aug 2023 (4 Weeks)
Underwent full-stack web development training with Brain Mentors, successfully completing multiple minor
projects and a major Music Web App project.

PROJECTS UNDERTAKEN

e Developed a telehealth web application, Mind Cradle, to enhance healthcare access by integrating GenAI for
prescription analysis, supporting doctor-patient profiles, prescription issuance, and online session booking. (September-

October 2024).

e Contributed to the front-end development using React JS for Nutri India Impex Pvt. Ltd., ensuring responsive UI/UX

across all screen sizes. Integrated dynamic product displays by fetching data from MongoDB. (August 2024)

e Developed a dynamic Music Web APP using the MERN stack and iTunes API. Built a responsive UI with MUI, Bootstrap,

and custom CSS components. (July-Aug 2023)

EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES
e Chief Organiser of Avensis 2024: Heading the media team for Avensis - Annual Tech Fest of MSIT
e = Participated in Start-up Mahakumbh in March 2024
e = Stood first in E-sports tournament organized by MyLobby India held in March 2024
e = Third Delhi city finalist of College Rivals - National level E-sports inter-college tournament
e Indian Mobile Congress 2023: Selected as a representative from MSIT, GGSIPU, for the 7th Edition of the India
Mobile Congress 2023, inaugurated by Hon’ble Prime Minister in October 2023.

POSITIONS OF RESPONSITBILITY
